title: Smartphone users in Canada 2013 to 2023
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Smartphone users in millions, containing a total of 11 data points.
Overall Smartphone users in millions has increased over the Year.
Smartphone users in millions is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2018, and finally roughly constant from 2018 to 2023.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Smartphone users in millions, of value 30.4 was reached at Year 2023
Minimum Smartphone users in millions about 15.2 was reached at Year 2013
